The program schedule would be developed from the experiences
gained in Phases IIâ€”V.
Critical factors in Phase VI would include.
1. Promotion
2. Audience Surveys
3. Cost analysis
4. Improved program sources
5. Increased second level service to stations not
connected live.
A decision on the future operation of the National Public
Radio System should be made prior to March 31, 1961.
